sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT k.g_defense) FROM appearances AS k WHERE k.g_p BETWEEN 1 AND 10 LIMIT 6
SELECT span_last, park_id FROM home_game WHERE  year < 63 AND attendance != (SELECT MIN(attendance) FROM team AS o WHERE  o.sb > 36) ORDER BY park_id ASC
SELECT league_id, span_last FROM home_game WHERE  attendance >= 96 ORDER BY span_last ASC
SELECT AVG(ibb), round FROM batting_postseason WHERE r BETWEEN 1 AND 10 OR sh NOT IN (SELECT sh FROM batting AS b WHERE  b.sf > 99) LIMIT 9
SELECT MAX(votes), COUNT(DISTINCT votes) FROM hall_of_fame WHERE  needed >= 9
SELECT COUNT(e.g_1b), MIN(e.g_c) FROM appearances AS e WHERE  e.g_ss != 4
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ipouts), manager.year FROM team JOIN manager ON manager.team_id = team.team_id WHERE e NOT IN (SELECT e FROM fielding_postseason AS j WHERE  j.year <= 59 LIMIT 5)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT park_alias), country FROM home_game JOIN park ON home_game.park_id = park.park_id ORDER BY country DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ballots), ballots, ballots FROM hall_of_fame ORDER BY ballots DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT SUM(h.w), h.g FROM manager_half AS h WHERE  h.year != 4 LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(h.birth_year), COUNT(DISTINCT h.height), h.weight FROM player AS h
SELECT points_won FROM manager_award_vote WHERE  points_won = 95
SELECT era, lg_win FROM team JOIN manager ON manager.team_id = team.team_id WHERE  so <= 30
SELECT birth_year FROM player_award JOIN player ON player_award.player_id = player.player_id WHERE  death_day >= 80 OR bats <= (SELECT SUM(bats) FROM player WHERE  birth_month >= 16) LIMIT 1
